version_description: back at it mayne. this time with minor ui improvements for ipads

ok so boom fixed a bug where a stray notification would send when the timer wasn't running

thanks for using tomato timer dear user, you are appreciated and admired.

for feedback/questions/feature requests/bug reports/love letters/hate mail -- email adam@adamtecle.com

new in this release:

- long press the timer to restart or complete the session. the skip button had to go
- landscape mode improvements

for questions/feedback email adam@adamtecle.com

minor bug-fixes and improvements

thanks for using tomato timer! for any and all questions/comments, email adam@adamtecle.com

new in this release:

- new theme colors
- fixed notification bug related to restarting the session and auto-start
- behind the scenes improvements

big thanks to all the users who wrote in with feedback! if you have a suggestion, a question, a bug report, or just want to say hello, send an email to adam@adamtecle.com
